property.name: troilkatt.admin.email
property.description: Administrator e-mail. It is used as the password when logging to NCBI FTP servers.

property.name: troilkatt.persistent.storage
property.description: File system to use for persistent storage. Valid values are: hadoop and nfs

property.name: troilkatt.localfs.dir
property.description:
Directory on local filesystem used by Troilkatt server and clients for intermediate files. The TROILKATT.DIR symbol is mapped to this directory.
Note! _all_ data in this directory will be deleted after each iteration.

property.name: troilkatt.localfs.log.dir
property.description: Directory where the main logfile (troilkatt.log) is stored. Additional logfiles are stored in the (intermediate) output directories for the crawlers and pipeline stages, and then saved into persistent storage.

property.name: troilkatt.globalfs.global-meta.dir
property.description:
This directory contains various global meta-data files used by many Troilkatt stage such as gold standards, gene names files, etc.
The TROILKATT.GLOBALMETA_DIR symbol is mapped to this directory.

property.name: troilkatt.localfs.sge.dir
property.description:
This directory contains local files for SGE jobs.
Note! _all_ data in this directory will be deleted after each iteration.

property.name: troilkatt.globalfs.sge.dir
property.description:
This directory contains globally shared files for SGE jobs.
Note! _all_ data in this directory will be deleted after each iteration.

property.name: troilkatt.global-meta.retain.days
property.description: Time in days for which global-meta data is retained before being deleted. If -1 global-meta is never deleted.

property.name: troilkatt.localfs.mapreduce.dir
property.description:
This directory is used by MapReduce jobs to save temporal data on the local FS.
Note! all data in this directory will be deleted after each iteration

property.name: troilkatt.localfs.binary.dir
property.description:
This directory contains binaries for programs started by Troilkatt.
The TROILKATT.BIN symbol is mapped to this directory.

property.name: troilkatt.localfs.utils.dir
property.description: This directory contains various scripts and tools used by the stages. The TROILKATT.UTILS symbol is mapped to this directory.

property.name: troilkatt.localfs.scripts.dir
property.description: This directory contains various scripts for processing a Troilkatt stage. The TROILKATT.SCRIPTS symbol is mapped to this directory.

property.name: troilkatt.tfs.root.dir
property.description: Root directory for Troilkatt files in NFS.

property.name: troilkatt.tfs.status.file
property.description:
This file contains the status of troilkatt iterations. It is used to do recovery by checking the status of the last update before initiating a new update.
The file is in persitent storage. It can be either a HDFS or NFS directory.

property.name: troilkatt.update.interval.hours
property.description: Time in hours between each time the crawlers are called.

property.name: troilkatt.libjars
property.description: Jar files passed to the hadoop MapReduce startup script (-libjars). These should include: hbase-VERSION.jar, commons-cli.jar, zookeeper.jar, commons-logging.jar

property.name: troilkatt.classpath
property.description:
Classpath used by SGEStage for executing sge.ExecuteStage
The classpath should include log4j-1.2.jar, commons-compress.jar, hbase.jar, and hadoop-core.jar. In addition the root directory for the troilkatt class files should be included (typically troilkatt2/bin).

property.name: troilkatt.container.bin
property.description: Troilkatt container binary. The container is used to ensure that applications started by troilkatt are limited with regards to memory usage and CPU time.
